example.eg: Please apply sunscreen before going outside.
example.egtrans: 请在出门前涂抹防晒霜。

example.eg: Apply the moisturizer liberally to your face and neck.
example.egtrans: 请将保湿液大量地涂抹在你的面部和颈部。

example.eg: Audrey is applying the same method as last time.
example.egtrans: 奥德莉使用的方法和上次一样。

example.eg: She was able to apply her skills to the new project.
example.egtrans: 她能够将她的技术运用到这个新项目上。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 将…运用到, 将…应用于

example.eg: A judge's job is to apply the law, not to make new laws.
example.egtrans: 一名法官的工作是实施法律，而非设立新的法律。

example.eg: In this new situation, the old rules do not apply.
example.egtrans: 老规则不适用于这个新情况。

example.eg: The guidelines do not apply to this case.
example.egtrans: 这个指导方针并不适用于这个案子。

example.eg: Cathy applied to three universities but none of them accepted her.
example.egtrans: 凯茜申请了三所大学，不过没有一所录取她。

example.eg: My brother applied to Microsoft and they offered him a job.
example.egtrans: 我哥哥向微软申请工作，然后成功了。

example.eg: Gordon applied his mechanical skills to building and flying aircraft.
example.egtrans: 戈登将自己的机械技艺运用在飞机的制造与驾驶上。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 把…运用在, 把…应用于

example.eg: Thomas applied for a credit card.
example.egtrans: 托马斯申请了一张信用卡。

dsense.name: apply for a job, apply for a position

example.eg: My only task for today is to apply for a job.
I don't have the time to apply makeup, so it's lucky I have nice skin!
If you get a nosebleed, you should pinch your nose and apply pressure.
example.egtrans: 如果鼻子出血，你应该捏住鼻子并用力按压。

example.eg: Applying pressure to the cut will stop the bleeding.
What the army calls "applying pressure to prisoners" other people might call "torture".
MPs are applying pressure on the government to spend more money on education.
If you apply yourself, you will succeed.
example.egtrans: 如果你专注于自身，你将会成功。

example.eg: I am really going to apply myself to my studies.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 全力以赴, 专心致志
